name: Keyhole Spy: Lots of Girls
description:
In Keyhole Spy: Lots of Girls you'll find the hottest ladies of Keyhole Spy games. If you've never played them, now it's high time to try!

The rules are simple: slide tiles into the blank squares to rearrange them and make a picture. Little to no efforts for a lot of fun ;)



Keyhole Spy: Lots of Girls features:

- sexy girls;
- simple yet exciting gameplay;
- achievements for your collection

Lovely student girls, teachers and nurses are waiting for you!
